Evidently, a LOT of people don't know what """"race"""" has to do with this topic. I don't either! *laughs* They're reading this portion of my statement above, """"How dare you come into this discussion with YOUR black history and run down this woman who quit a very hard drug, a drug more addictive than Meth, Marijuana, and alcohol combined."""" Ok. First of all, the word black has multiple meanings, but what it shouldn't mean is African American, dark brown skin, or a reference to a breed of humans to more educated individuals. I understand Internet being on cell phones and Facebook opening up to the public means sometimes I need to take things down a level. synonyms for the word black in the context utilized above.
